document.full_text: the philadelphia phillies provided plenty of offense in support of cliff lee, the team's prized free-agent acquisition, as they thumped the houston astros 9-4 on saturday.
document.title: lee sharp in philadelphia's win over astros
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia phillies provided plenty of offense in support of cliff lee, the team's prized free-agent acquisition, as they thumped the houston astros 9-4 on saturday.
